text: Oscar Núñez (1929 – February 9, 2012) was an Argentine actor. He was known for his work in movie and theater. Some of his best known movie roles were in Nine Queens in 2000, Good Life Delivery in 2004, and Un novio para mi mujer in 2008. Núñez died from complications of cancer on February 9, 2012, at the age of 83. He was buried at the La Chacarita Cemetery in Buenos Aires. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1929 births Category:2012 deaths Category:Deaths from cancer Category:Argentine actors
title: Oscar Núñez
